ⴱⴰⵔⵉⴽⴰ |nickname = |settlement_type = City and Common |motto = |image_skyline = APC de Barika.jpg |imagesize = |image_caption = Barika |image_flag = |flag_size = |image_seal = |seal_size = |image_map = Dz - 05-42 Barika - Wilaya de Batna map.svg |mapsize = |map_caption = Location of Barika in the [[Batna Province]] |pushpin_map = Algeria |pushpin_label_position = bottom |pushpin_mapsize = |pushpin_map_caption = Location of Barika in the [[Algeria]] |coordinates = {{coord|35|23|50|N|5|21|57|E|type:city_region:DZ|display=inline,title}} | coor_pinpoint = |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = {{flag|Algeria}} |subdivision_type1 = [[Provinces of Algeria|Province]] |subdivision_name1 = [[Batna Province]] |subdivision_type2 = [[Districts of Algeria|District]] |subdivision_name2 = [[Barika District]] |subdivision_type3 = |subdivision_name3 = |government_footnotes = |government_type = [[Municipality]] |leader_title = [[Mayor]] |leader_name = |established_title = APC |established_date = 2012-2017 |area_magnitude = |unit_pref = Imperial |area_footnotes = |area_total_km2 = 304 |area_land_km2 = |population_as_of = 2008 |population_footnotes = |population_note = |population_total = 104388 |population_density_km2 = |timezone = [[Central European Time|CET]] |utc_offset = +1 |elevation_footnotes = |elevation_m = |elevation_ft = |iso_code = CP |postal_code_type = [[List of postal codes in Algeria|Postal code]] |postal_code = 05001 |area_code = |blank_name = |blank_info = |website = |footnotes = }} '''Barika''' ({{lang-ar|''' بريكة'''}}) is a city in [[Batna Province]], in Eastern [[Algeria]]. The city has a population of 144,547 (2005 estimates).{{Citation needed|date=April 2009}} ==Demographics== {| class=wikitable |+ Historical populations ! Year !! Population[http://www.populstat.info/Africa/algeriat.htm populstat.info] {{webarchive|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160303175036/http://www.populstat.info/Africa/algeriat.htm |date=2016-03-03 }} |- | 1954 || 74,800 |- | 1987 || 56,500 |- | 1998 || 79,500 |} ==Notes== {{reflist}} {{Batna Province}} [[Category:Populated places in Batna Province]] [[Category:Communes of Algeria]] [[Category:Cities in Algeria]]
